attributes.action: Make a bike strip for teenagers to practice wheelies
attributes.additional_details: An ideal steip would be something which is protected from the weather, with lighting.
attributes.background: Me and my friends cannot find a safe place to ride and practice our tricks, if a strip was made we wouldnt be in car parks.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to build a bike strip would be one for your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
